subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: At 6 feet and 155 pounds, Joshua Ko was not an imposing figure, but his drive endeared him to Panthers fans — and those who root for the underdog.
snippet: At 6 feet and 155 pounds, Joshua Ko was not an imposing figure, but his drive endeared him to Panthers fans — and those who root for the underdog.
